alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 04 at 5:44PM MDT until April 05 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations up to three inches. Areas of blowing snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel over the Bighorn mountains on Highway 14 will be difficult tonight with slick snow covered road conditions and poor visibility at times.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
